title: MacBook Air 2020 Full Review
description: The 2020 Apple MacBook Air is a big step up but did they push it too far?  That sweet new episode of The Test Drivers is LIVE!   Apple MacBook Air on Amazon:   Full specs of the custom Core i5 Apple are using for the MacBook Air:   By using our Amazon affiliate links we may receive compensation for purchases through those links.  My new podcast The Test Drivers!  Our second channel @thisis!  Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:

Now I wanna be clear, this is not throttling, right. Pretty much all laptops will do this, they will have a really high boost frequency and they'll come down to their base.
